comment:
* Builder for {@link BluetoothHapPresetInfo}. * *

By default, the preset index will be set to {@link * BluetoothHapClient#PRESET_INDEX_UNAVAILABLE}, the name to an empty string, writability and * availability both to false. * * @hide

methods.name: public Builder setWritable(boolean isWritable)
methods.comment:
* Set preset writability for HAP preset info.
         *
         * @param isWritable whether preset is writable
         * @return the same Builder instance

methods.name: public Builder setAvailable(boolean isAvailable)
methods.comment:
* Set preset availability for HAP preset info.
         *
         * @param isAvailable whether preset is currently available to select
         * @return the same Builder instance
